message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of index coding, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and network coding (cs.NI). It also involves graph theory (cs.DS) and optimization (cs.SI), as well as linear algebra (cs.LG) in the context of the linear scalar index coding problem.
